channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: Updated: flake8-use-pathlib (0.2.1)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 finding use of functions that can be replaced by pathlib module.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: nitpick (0.29)
item.description: Enforce the same settings across multiple language-independent projects
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-pytest-style (1.5.1)
item.description: A flake8 plugin checking common style issues or inconsistencies with pytest-based tests.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-timeout (0.3)
item.description: flake8 plugin which checks that a timeout is set to all requests and urllib.request.open calls
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-functions-names (0.2)
item.description: An extension for flake8 that validates functions names, decomposition and conformity with annotations.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-helper (0.2)
item.description: A helper library for Flake8 plugins.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-unused-arguments (0.0.8)
item.description: flake8 extension to warn on unused function arguments
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-type-checking (1.0.4)
item.description: A flake8 plugin for managing type-checking imports & forward references
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-datetime-utcnow-plugin (0.1.2)
item.description: Plugin to check that utcnow() is not used in favour of now(UTC)
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-unused-arguments (0.0.7)
item.description: flake8 extension to warn on unused function arguments
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: dlint (0.12)
item.description: Dlint is a tool for encouraging best coding practices and helping ensure Python code is secure.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: nitpick (0.28)
item.description: Enforce the same settings across multiple language-independent projects
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-future-annotations (0.0.4)
item.description: Verifies python 3.7+ files use from __future__ import annotations
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-force-keyword-arguments (1.0.3)
item.description: A flake8 extension that is looking for function calls and forces to use keyword arguments if there are more than X arguments
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-escaping-style (0.1.2)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to use consistent escaping style in string or bytes literals
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-leading-blank-lines (1.0.4)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to detect blank lines at the start of a file
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-use-fstring (1.3)
item.description: Flake8 plugin for string formatting style.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-use-fstring (1.2.1)
item.description: Flake8 plugin for string formatting style.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-eradicate (1.2)
item.description: Flake8 plugin to find commented out code
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-markdown (0.3)
item.description: Lints Python code blocks in Markdown files using flake8
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-use-fstring (1.2)
item.description: Flake8 plugin for string formatting style.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-broken-line (0.4)
item.description: Flake8 plugin to forbid backslashes for line breaks
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-quotes (3.3.1)
item.description: Flake8 lint for quotes.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-nb (0.3.1)
item.description: Flake8 based checking for jupyter notebooks
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: darglint (1.8.1)
item.description: A utility for ensuring Google-style docstrings stay up to date with the source code.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-isort (4.1.1)
item.description: flake8 plugin that integrates isort .
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-no-implicit-concat (0.3.1)
item.description: Flake8 plugin that forbids implicit str/bytes literal concatenations
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-commas (2.1)
item.description: Flake8 lint for trailing commas.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-docstring-checker (1)
item.description: A simple flake8 plugin that checks if everything has a docstring
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-tuple-trailing-commas (0.1.4)
item.description: flake8 plugin for enforcing few rules
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-no-types (1.3)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to ban type hints.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-literal (1.2)
item.description: Flake8 string literal validation
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-no-pep420 (1.2)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to ban PEP-420 implicit namespace packages.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-noqa (1.2)
item.description: Flake8 noqa comment validation
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8 (4.0.1)
item.description: the modular source code checker: pep8 pyflakes and co
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-annotations (2.7)
item.description: Flake8 Type Annotation Checks
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-tidy-imports (4.5)
item.description: A flake8 plugin that helps you write tidier imports.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-comprehensions (3.7)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to help you write better list/set/dict comprehensions.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: pycodestyle (2.8)
item.description: Python style guide checker
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8 (4)
item.description: the modular source code checker: pep8 pyflakes and co
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-no-implicit-concat (0.3)
item.description: Flake8 plugin that forbids implicit str/bytes literal concatenations
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-qgis (1)
item.description: Flake8 plugin for QGIS python plugins.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: autoflake8 (0.2.2)
item.description: Tool to automatically fix some issues reported by flake8 (forked from autoflake).
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-no-implicit-concat (0.2.1)
item.description: Flake8 plugin that forbids implicit string literal concatenations
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: pyflakes (2.4)
item.description: passive checker of Python programs
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-typing-imports (1.11)
item.description: flake8 plugin which checks that typing imports are properly guarded
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-type-ignore (0.1.post2)
item.description: flake8-type-ignore allows you to disallow type: ignore comments in your typed Python code.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-no-implicit-concat (0.2)
item.description: Flake8 plugin that forbids implicit string literal concatenations
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-bugbear (21.9.2)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 finding likely bugs and design problems in your program. Contains warnings that don't belong in pyflakes and pycodestyle.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-formatter-vscode (0.0.1)
item.description: Flake8 formatter.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)
